snippet: Lionel Messi notched his third hat trick in his past four games, rallying Barcelona over visiting Espanyol.
abstract: Lionel Messi scores a hat trick and rallies Barcelona to 5-1 victory over Espanyol in Catalan Derby; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi notched his third hat trick in his past four games, rallying Barcelona over visiting Espanyol.

headline.main: Messi Records Hat Trick to Key Barcelona Victory
headline.print_headline: Messi Records Hat Trick to Key Barcelona Victory
